title: league of legends wont install
body: I've got a new laptop recently running windows 10 and when I try to install league of legends it says Error 1935,'' An error occurred during the installation of assembly'', then it says VIsual C++2005 SPI Redistributuable (64x) mandatory prerequisite was not correctly installed. Any ideas how to fix this?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Still experiencing this problem?

Have you tried running the installer as admin?
